name: e2emobile
description: Projeto de teste e2e automatizado do aplicativo apcap da sorte ADS

scripts.ios: PLATFORM=iOS APP=/Users/jeffersonsoaresdesouza/Downloads/ApcapSP.app DEVICE='iPhone 14' $DEVICE -t 'iPhone 14 (16.4)' && VERSION=16.4 npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.android: PLATFORM=Android APP='/Users/jeffersonsoaresdesouza/Downloads/app-qa.apk' DEVICE=android_device VERSION=9 PACKAGE=br.com.apcapsp.app.debug ACTIVITY=br.com.apcapsp.app.SplashActivity npx codeceptjs run --steps
